title: Now Jack & Stoney are Gone, and J. J. & George are GONE
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Now Jack & Stoney are Gone, and J. J. & George are GONE
posts.post_content:
No, it's not a Net54 Law Firm, but you can retain any of these guys if you choose.

Jack (or John F.) White  VG+  BVG 3.5  Sweet Caporal 350 Fact 30  -  $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10230/white-j[/IMG]

George McQuillan (Ball in Hand)  VG+  BVG 3.5  Sweet Caporal 150 Fact 25  -  $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10161/mcquillen-fielding[/IMG]

Stoney McGlynn  (No Ball in Hand)  G/VG  BVG 2.5  Piedmont 350  $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10157/mcglynn[/IMG]

J. J. Clarke  VG  SGC 40  Sweet Caporal 150 Fact 30   $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10305/clarke-j-j[/IMG]

Feel free to mix and match with your collection.
